nodes.name: getReserveRatio

@return The tobin tax expresesed as a fixidity fraction.

params.test: Set to true to skip implementation initialization

getAssetAllocationWeights().return: An array of a list of weights used for the allocation of reserve assets.

params._assetAllocationSymbols: The symbols of the reserve assets.
params._frozenDays: The number of days during which the frozen gold thaws.
params._frozenGold: The balance of reserve gold that is frozen.
params._spendingRatio: The relative daily spending limit for the reserve spender.
params._tobinTax: The tobin tax value as a fixidity fraction.
params._tobinTaxReserveRatio: When to turn on the tobin tax, as a fixidity fraction.
params._tobinTaxStalenessThreshold: The initial number of seconds to cache tobin tax value for.
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry core smart contract.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.index: The index in exchangeSpenderAddresses of spender.
params.spender: The address that is to be no longer allowed to spend Reserve funds.

removeToken(address,uint256).return: Returns true if the transaction succeeds.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.symbols: The symbol of each asset in the Reserve portfolio.
params.weights: The weight for the corresponding asset as unwrapped Fixidity.Fraction.

params.frozenDays: The number of days the frozen CELO thaws over.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params.value: The reserve ratio at which the tobin tax sets in.
The number of seconds to cache the tobin tax value for.

transferExchangeGold(address,uint256).details: Transfers are not subject to a daily spending limit.

params.to: The address that will receive the gold.

params.value: The amount of gold to transfer.

transferGold(address,uint256).return: Returns true if the transaction succeeds.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Ensures price stability of StableTokens with respect to their pegs

addExchangeSpender(address).notice: Gives an address permission to spend Reserve without limit.

addOtherReserveAddress(address).notice: Add a reserve address whose balance shall be included in the reserve ratio.

addSpender(address).notice: Gives an address permission to spend Reserve funds.

addToken(address).notice: Add a token that the reserve will stabilize.

methods.constructor: Sets initialized == true on implementation contracts

getAssetAllocationSymbols().notice: Returns a list of token symbols that have been allocated.

getAssetAllocationWeights().notice: Returns a list of weights used for the allocation of reserve assets.

getExchangeSpenders().notice: Returns addresses of exchanges permitted to spend Reserve funds. Because exchangeSpenderAddresses was introduced after cUSD, cUSD's exchange is not included in this list.

getFrozenReserveGoldBalance().notice: Returns the amount of frozen CELO in the reserve.

getOrComputeTobinTax().notice: Returns the tobin tax, recomputing it if it's stale.

getOtherReserveAddresses().notice: Returns the list other addresses included in the reserve total.

getOtherReserveAddressesGoldBalance().notice: Returns the amount of CELO included in other reserve addresses.

getReserveGoldBalance().notice: Returns the amount of CELO included in the reserve.

getReserveRatio().notice: Computes the ratio of current reserve balance to total stable token valuation.

getTokens().notice: Returns the list of stabilized token addresses.

getUnfrozenBalance().notice: Returns the amount of unfrozen CELO in the reserve.

getUnfrozenReserveGoldBalance().notice: Returns the amount of unfrozen CELO included in the reserve.

getVersionNumber().notice: Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

removeExchangeSpender(address,uint256).notice: Takes away an address's permission to spend Reserve funds without limits.

removeOtherReserveAddress(address,uint25.notice: Remove reserve address whose balance shall no longer be included in the reserve ratio.

removeSpender(address).notice: Takes away an address's permission to spend Reserve funds.

removeToken(address,uint256).notice: Remove a token that the reserve will no longer stabilize.

setAssetAllocations(bytes32[],uint256[]).notice: Sets target allocations for CELO and a diversified basket of non-Celo assets.

setDailySpendingRatio(uint256).notice: Set the ratio of reserve that is spendable per day.

setFrozenGold(uint256,uint256).notice: Sets the balance of reserve gold frozen from transfer.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setTobinTaxReserveRatio(uint256).notice: Sets the reserve ratio at which the tobin tax sets in.

setTobinTaxStalenessThreshold(uint256).notice: Sets the number of seconds to cache the tobin tax value for.

transferExchangeGold(address,uint256).notice: Transfer unfrozen gold to any address, used for one side of CP-DOTO.

transferGold(address,uint256).notice: Transfer gold to a whitelisted address subject to reserve spending limits.
